TopicTitle: Can you add/remove space music in KSP?

Articles.Content: So, I've been on many interplanetary missions, and I'm getting tired of hearing the same old music. Is it possible to add new music and remove the old music?

On May 29, 2016 at 10:54 PM, electricpants said:

So, I've been on many interplanetary missions, and I'm getting tired of hearing the same old music. Is it possible to add new music and remove the old music?

I second this. I'd like to know the same thing, without the typical "run YouTube in another window" answer.
Well, there's a mod for that... but unfortunately the author's life has conspired to keep him from updating it so far.

Hello,

I usually switch off the in-game music (music volume to 0) and use youtube or soundcloud in background. (EVE game sound track is great and free on soundcloud.)

See you,

Vive_moi
